function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for park access leading to overcrowding","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases due to crowding in parks","Mitigation":"Implement capacity limits or staggered entry to reduce overcrowding","Technologies":"Park monitoring systems, mobile apps for booking entry slots","People":"Park visitors, local residents","Owner":"Park management, local government"},{"Description":"Mental health issues due to restricted access to green spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of depression, anxiety, and other mental health issues","Mitigation":"Prioritize opening green spaces while adhering to safety protocols","Technologies":"Mental health support apps, online counseling services","People":"Residents, especially those reliant on green spaces for emotional well-being","Owner":"Local government, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate resources for maintaining safe park environments","Impact":"Risk of unsanitary conditions and lack of enforcement of safety measures","Mitigation":"Allocate additional resources for park maintenance and enforcement of safety protocols","Technologies":"Smart park management systems, surveillance cameras, IoT sensors for capacity monitoring","People":"Park visitors, local residents, park staff","Owner":"Park management, local government"}]}
